SimpleDataListSpec.Name: ProjectsAvailableForSponsorship Simple Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: Simple data list for the Projects collection when sponsoring a project.
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPSimpleList.common:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_PROJECTS_AVAILABLE_TOSPONSOR as select ID as VALUE, NAME as LABEL from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYPROJECT order by NAME
